comment: Professor Collette was an awesome professor, he is understanding and not a harsh grader. We did have a midterm and final on paper.

Incredible lectures. It's clear that he is passionate about what he teaches. He gave tons of life examples to illustrate the material and made the class fun. He does have a midterm and a final, but there are many other ways to boost your grade in the class. I never felt like I didn't have a chance for a good grade.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Honestly he is so boring. I am currently in his class and all he does is read off the powerpoint. Also he does not prepare you for the 2 exam's at all! He gave us a study guide with definitions for the textbook and practically none of it was on the exam's. Textbook is also required and you have to buy it on your own.
Good lectures, all assignments are done at home and in class is lecture, videos, and group discussions. All the quizzes, tests, and assignments are easy and from the powerpoint and textbook.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: LOVED his lectures. They were engaging and fun while genuinely contributing to your understanding of the course. He is full of personality, so class is never boring. The material itself is easy and there is no lockdown browser, which is amazing. Overall a good guy who genuinely cares about his students and helps them get the best grade possible

he is amazing. Best professor ive had in my whole undergrad career. Funny, nice, and knowledgeable. Really cares about his students. Easy class if you put fourth the effort. Clear grading. No textbook. No tests. TAKE HIM

EASY CLASS. all discussion and assignment based and no tests. attendance isn't a grade but assignments/discussions are done in class and you'll get a 0 if you don't show up. easy workload. He's very kind and funny and has great energy. cool guy!!
An all-around good professor! His tests were pretty easy as long as you attended lectures and he made the lectures very fun. A very good professor overall.

Professor Collette really cares about his students. He will always make an effort for you if he sees you are trying. His lectures are great too. Be prepared for a lot of work, but it is easy to do well if you stay on top of each assignment.

If you are nervous about taking Advanced Psych Lab, TAKE DR. COLLETTE! He made this class so less stressful. There are no tests in his class, but there is a lot of other assignments to make up for that. Show up to class, and you'll do fine. Dr. Collette has clear guidelines and he is so caring and wants the best for his students! Take him!

Professor Collette is the best professor I've taken this semester. He understands how stressful college is and makes sure to give students enough time to do his work, and he loves what he teaches. The system he uses to grade is point-based, so it makes it easy to succeed. His final is completely optional if you're satisfied with your grade.

Professor Tyler Collette was an excellent instructor for psychology, especially for a freshman/first year student. He does not have an unbearable work-load, the grading system is point-based, so as long as you do the work, you will come out on top. Professor Collette does have a final, however, it is optional if you are satisfied with your grade.

If you want an A, take this class. Mr. Collette makes the class almost too easy. Every assignment, including quizzes and tests, is all online and is not on lockdown browsers. Attendance is not mandatory, but if you attend a certain amount of classes you get extra credit. Personally, I just go to class and watch Netflix, and I still have an A.

All work is done online through d2l. Lectures are very long and typically take up the entire class period. Attendance is optional, however attendance can be used for extra credit at the end of the semester. Never miss an assignment or due date because he will likely NOT allow you to make it up.

The class is well organized. He is kind and a reasonable grader. There is a good amount of work but it is designed in a way that isn't overwhelming. His lectures were great and set up in a way that worked well considering we are in a pandemic... As others have said, be prepared for the rickroll!

Attendance is extra credit! He's super kind, set up the class to be streamed after I sat out because of catching corona. His quizzes have unlimited attempts and are open book as well as the exams, which have short answer questions he sends out beforehand. He has fun meme assignments to do as well. The last discussion board he rickrolled us tho...
